department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: This Bid Solicitation is issued against the Learning Services Supply Arrangement (SA) E60ZH-2100LS, Stream 2 — Instructional Design and Development Services. The requirement is for modernizing courseware provided by the equation of a Virtual Academy within Defence Learning Network 3.0
description: The requirement described herein is open only to PWGSC Learning Services SA (LSSA) Suppliers. The requirement is for the Department of National Defence (DND) to acquire the services of a Junior Learning Designer for modernizing courseware.
full_summary:
# W0113-23CS14 Junior Learning Designer
#### English/French
* English: [Notice URL]  
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14528591?extsite=MTQ1Mjg1OTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* French: [avis URL]  
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14528591?extsite=MTQ1Mjg1OTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Description (Tender Details)

#### English
Amendment

All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted on 2022-11-23 at 14:00 EST.  
Any submissions received after 14:00 EST will be declared non-responsive.

This bid solicitation is issued against the Learning Services Supply Arrangement (SA) E60ZH-2100LS, Stream 2 - Instructional Design and Development Services.  The Terms and Conditions of the Learning Services SA apply and are incorporated into any resulting contract.

The requirement described herein is open only to PWGSC Learning Services SA (LSSA) Suppliers.  

The Department of National Defence is seeking the services of one (1) Junior Learning Designer for modernizing courseware to provide transparency and accessibility for the Military Police Group through the development of a Virtual Academy within the Defence Learning Network 3.0.

#### French
Modifications

Toutes les pièces justificatives requises et la soumission doivent être soumises le 2022-11-23 à 14:00 HNE.  
Toutes les soumissions soumises après 14 :00 HNE seront déclaré non conforme.

La présente demande de soumission est émise dans le cadre de l’arrangement en matière d’approvisionnement (AMA) pour les services en apprentissage, (SA) E60ZH-2100LS, volet 2 – Services de conception et d’élaboration pédagogiques. Toutes les modalités de l’AMA portant sur des services d’apprentissage s’appliquent et sont intégrées à tout contrat subséquent.

Le présent marché ne s’adresse qu’aux fournisseurs de l’AMA des services d’apprentissage de TPSGC.

L’École de la police militaire des Forces canadiennes du ministère de la Dé
